c.t: 13.02.010 In This Title, the Following Terms Shall Be Defined as Follows:

c.x: "DOMICILE" shall mean a person's permanent residence (Article III, Section
"Filing" shall mean actual delivery or postmark for delivery by deadline da
"Legal Relationship" shall mean a relationship by virtue of legally recogni
"Notice of Intent" shall mean written notification by a candidate of that p
"Resident" shall mean an enrolled Turtle Mountain Chippewa person or person
"Official/Officer" shall mean a person vested with the authority of a Triba
"Referendum" shall mean an action by the tribal governing body to refer any
"Voters" shall mean all voters entitled to vote in the Tribal Elections, ba
"Enrolled member" shall mean any member of the Turtle Mountain Band of Chip
"Spoiled ballot" shall mean a ballot which is not stamped and/or initialed
"RECALL" shall mean an election to vote on whether a particular elected off
A "QUALIFIED VOTER" shall mean an enrolled member of the Turtle Mountain Ba
"TALLYING" shall mean by hand or electronic equipment.

Must reside within Rolette County; and
Shall furnish written proof for all requirements.  In addition, candidates
